p: Figure 5 illustrates the resulting voltammograms of solutions of 5 mM analyte dissolved in 0.1 M KOH/0.9 M KCl. The kinetics and the redox potential were affected both by the type and the position (relative to the active ring) of the functional groups. Molecules 20 and 18 have charged functional groups attached to the pyrazine ring and displayed the slowest electrochemical kinetics. When similar groups (e.g., â€“COOH) were attached further away from the pyrazine ring, it had a significantly smaller effect on the kinetics ( 19).
